xml.data:
Home » 38P2 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (2) » 13 Piṭṭhiduka » 13.9 Sukhasahagataduka » 13.9.7 Pañhāvāra » 13.9.7.1--4 Paccayānulomādi » 13.9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
Piṭṭhiduka
Sukhasahagataduka
Pañhāvāra
Paccayānulomādi
Saṅkhyāvāra
Suddha
176.
4463Hetuyā cattāri, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajāte nava, aññamaññe nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejāte tīṇi, pacchājāte tīṇi, āsevane nava, kamme cha, vipāke nava, āhāre cattāri, indriye nava, jhāne nava, magge cattāri, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pañca, atthiyā nava, natthiyā nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.
4464(Evaṃ paccanīyavibhaṅgopi gaṇanāpi sappītikadukasadisaṃ kātabbaṃ, yadipi vimati atthi anulomaṃ passitvā gaṇetabbaṃ.)
4465Sukhasahagatadukaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
<< 13.9.7.1.2 Saṅkhyāvāraup13.10 Upekkhāsahagataduka >>
